name: Heskiers One Tool
descr:
Heskiers® OneToolâ„¢ is an ergonomic massage, acupressure and myofascial release tool, promoting the flow of the interstitial fluid for use by professional bodyworkers and sports teams to help increase performance, enhance daily recovery, treat sports injuries, pain and relieve tension.
